cards.title: Your Current Keep Rate
cards.text: We'll calculate exactly what percentage of your income you're actually keeping after taxes, fees, and wealth drains.

cards.title: Hidden Wealth Drains
cards.text: Identify the specific areas where your money is quietly leaking - often in places you've never considered.

cards.title: Your Optimization Path
cards.text: Get a clear roadmap of strategies that could help you keep more of what you earn - tailored to your situation.

items.quote: The audit revealed I was paying way more than I needed to. Within 3 months, we had restructured everything and I'm keeping $85K more per year.
items.name: James Morrison

items.quote: I'd been with the same accountant for 12 years. WealthBridge found opportunities no one had ever mentioned. The projected savings over my career are incredible.
items.name: Patricia Lee

items.quote: I went from paying 50% in taxes to 12%. Same income, completely different outcome. I wish I'd known about this years ago.
items.name: Robert Kim

process.title: Your Path to a Higher Keep Rate

steps.title: Book Your Call
steps.text: Select a 30-minute slot that works for you. We'll send you a brief questionnaire to prepare.

steps.title: Discovery Call
steps.text: We'll analyze your current structure, identify wealth drains, and calculate your Keep Rate.

steps.title: Get Your Roadmap
steps.text: Walk away with clear next steps - whether that's working with us or implementing changes on your own.

cta.title: What's Your Keep Rate?
cta.subtitle: Find out exactly where your wealth is going - and get a plan to keep more of it.
